Package az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.service

Class AuthorServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.service.AuthorServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorService
@Service public class AuthorServiceImpl extends Object implements AuthorService
Service implementation for managing authors. This service provides methods to perform CRUD operations on authors,as well as searching for authors based on various criteria.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthorServiceImpl

      @Autowired public AuthorServiceImpl(AuthorRepository authorRepository, BookRepository bookRepository)
      Constructs an instance of AuthorServiceImpl. Initializes the author and book repositories and fetches all nationalities from the database.
      Parameters:
      authorRepository - the author repository
      bookRepository - the book repository

  • Method Details

    • getAllNationalities

      public List<String> getAllNationalities()
      Gets all unique nationalities from the authors stored in the database. If no nationalities are found, returns an empty list.
      Specified by:
      getAllNationalities in interface AuthorService
      Returns:
      a list of all unique nationalities

    • getAllAuthors

      public List<Author> getAllAuthors()
      Retrieves all authors stored in the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllAuthors in interface AuthorService
      Returns:
      a list of all authors

    • getAuthorById

      public Optional<Author> getAuthorById(Integer id)
      Retrieves an author by their ID.
      Specified by:
      getAuthorById in interface AuthorService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the author to retrieve
      Returns:
      an optional containing the author if found, otherwise empty

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • updateAuthor

      public void updateAuthor(Integer id, Author author)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      author - the updated author object

    • deleteAuthor

      public void deleteAuthor(Integer id)
      Deletes an author by their ID. Also removes associations with any books authored by the deleted author. If book has no author in the database, it should also get deleted.
      Specified by:
      deleteAuthor in interface AuthorService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the author to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the author with the specified ID is not found

    • searchAuthors

      public List<Author> searchAuthors(String fullName, Integer birthYear, String nationality)
      Searches for authors based on the provided criteria. If no criteria are provided, returns all authors.
      Specified by:
      searchAuthors in interface AuthorService
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the author (can be partial)
      birthYear - the birth year of the author
      nationality - the nationality of the author
      Returns:
      a list of authors matching the search criteria
